title: Newly Opened: The Park Baga River Goa, India's Hottest Boutique Hotel
description: Brought to you by the prestigious The Park hospitality group, renowned for its collection of contemporary boutique hotels across India, indulge in an exclusive Escapes Club getaway at the brand-new The Park Baga River Goa, located minutes away from the world-famous Baga Beach. Be one of the first guests to enjoy a romantic break staying in a spacious Luxury Room with daily breakfast, one multi-course dinner for two, and one cocktail per person each night.
offer_address: Dr.Constancio Mascarenhas River View, 403516 Baga, India

title: Romantic Adults-Only Boutique Escape in Goa
description: Brought to you by the prestigious The Park hospitality group, renowned for its collection of contemporary boutique hotels across India, indulge in an exclusive Escapes Club getaway at The Park Baga River Goa, located minutes away from the world-famous Baga Beach. Enjoy a romantic break staying in a spacious Luxury Room with daily breakfast, one multi-course dinner for two, and two cocktails per person each night.
location_description: The Park Baga River Goa OLD
offer_address: Dr.Constancio Mascarenhas River View, 403516 Baga, India
